Sentencas: Policies in both industrialized and developing countries are modifying to reach a better perspective of utilizing renewable energies.
Titulo: A hybrid micro gas turbine and solid state fuel cell power plant with hydrogen production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: Besides, methods that could combine traditional power generation plants with energy conversion efficient technologies are mostly encouraged.
Titulo: A hybrid micro gas turbine and solid state fuel cell power plant with hydrogen production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: In this paper, a novel power plant design which uses a hybrid system of solid state fuel cell and micro turbine gas are assessed for power generation with capturing CO2 and a three-reactors chemical looping for hydrogen generation (TRCL) from natural gas using three reactors.
Titulo: A hybrid micro gas turbine and solid state fuel cell power plant with hydrogen production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: The generated hydrogen then is used as fuel in a solid state fuel cell.
Titulo: A hybrid micro gas turbine and solid state fuel cell power plant with hydrogen production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: Produced gas from solid state fuel cells (SOFC) contains non-reacted hydrogen which is fueled to a micro gas turbine.
Titulo: A hybrid micro gas turbine and solid state fuel cell power plant with hydrogen production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: Energy analyses show advantage of using hybrid system in specific conditions when efficiency can reach up to 51.4% for lower heating values.
Titulo: A hybrid micro gas turbine and solid state fuel cell power plant with hydrogen production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: On the other hand, another interesting feature of the introduced hybrid system is on the gain of 100% CO2 capturing at comparable high energy efficiency.
Titulo: A hybrid micro gas turbine and solid state fuel cell power plant with hydrogen production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: These features like zero CO2 emission and high energy efficiency make the power plant performance noteworthy.
Titulo: A hybrid micro gas turbine and solid state fuel cell power plant with hydrogen production and CO2 capture

Sentencas: Influence of parameters such as SOFC temperature, system pressure, utilization factor and CO2 expander exhaust pressure are investigated.
Titulo: A hybrid micro gas turbine and solid state fuel cell power plant with hydrogen production and CO2 capture
